mainProduct.name: Intelligent Behavior Analysis Equipment Set
mainProduct.description: The AIB Intelligent Behavior Analysis System applies artificial intelligence (AI) for video surveillance and automatic detection of abnormal behaviors on camera systems. Deep Learning technology enables accurate recognition of dangerous or violation situations, sending real-time alerts to operators. The system supports zone setup, security scenario creation, camera-based configuration, and visual monitoring. AIB detects diverse behaviors including restricted area intrusion, climbing, fighting, weapon carrying, vandalism, smoking, gambling, as well as emergencies like suicide risk or abnormal falls.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: AMBILI TECH is a leading technology company specializing in AI-powered surveillance and security solutions. We partner with AMBILI TECH to deliver cutting-edge behavior analysis systems that transform how enterprises approach security monitoring.
about.description2: Our AIB solution leverages Deep Learning and Neural Networks to provide proactive surveillance, replacing passive monitoring with intelligent, real-time threat detection.

hero.title: AI Intelligent Behavior
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive AI-powered surveillance solution for detecting and alerting abnormal behaviors in real-time, enhancing security for enterprises worldwide.
hero.aboutDescription1: AIB (Artificial Intelligence Behavior) is intelligent behavior analysis software that applies artificial intelligence to identify abnormal behaviors on camera images. The system uses Deep Learning models (DNN/CNN) to analyze movements and behaviors in real-time, enabling early detection of dangerous situations or violations.
hero.aboutDescription2: The system allows users to set up monitoring zones, configure security scenarios, and manage parameters for each camera. The interface supports intuitive monitoring, suitable for various surveillance needs.

technicalSpecs.title: Technical Specifications
technicalSpecs.subtitle: AI Module Performance
technicalSpecs.description: Optimized AI system for detecting and alerting abnormal behaviors

responseTime.label: Response Time
responseTime.description: Fast detection for simple behaviors. Deep analysis for complex behaviors. Real-time alerting system.

accuracyRate.label: Accuracy Rate
accuracyRate.description: Deep Neural Network algorithms. Reduced false alerts via context. Continuous learning from data.

cameraSupport.label: Camera Support
cameraSupport.description: Multi-stream video processing. Scalable architecture. Optimized resource usage.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.subtitle: Powerful AI integration for real-time abnormal behavior detection

behaviorRecognition.title: Behavior Recognition
behaviorRecognition.description: Detect and classify over 12 different violation behaviors using Deep Neural Networks with contextual analysis.

realTimeAlerts.title: Real-time Alerts
realTimeAlerts.description: Automatically send alerts to monitoring screens and mobile devices within 5 seconds upon detecting anomalies.

zoneConfiguration.title: Zone Configuration
zoneConfiguration.description: Set up restricted and prohibited zones flexibly for each camera with polygon, rectangle, and boundary line options.

weaponDetection.title: Weapon Detection
weaponDetection.description: Identify objects carrying dangerous items like knives, scissors, sticks, and metal objects in the frame.

actionRecognition.title: Action Recognition
actionRecognition.description: Track posture, movement direction, and person-object-environment interactions to detect abnormal behaviors.

smartReporting.title: Smart Reporting
smartReporting.description: Export detailed reports on events with images, timestamps, locations, and violation trend analytics.

behaviorsList.title: Behavior Detection
behaviorsList.subtitle: Detected Behaviors
behaviorsList.description: The system can recognize and alert 12 types of violation behaviors with 70-85% accuracy

hardwareSpecs.title: Hardware
hardwareSpecs.subtitle: Included Equipment
hardwareSpecs.description: High-performance hardware system ensuring stable 24/7 AI processing

systemArchitecture.title: System Architecture
systemArchitecture.subtitle: Connection Model Overview
systemArchitecture.description: Multi-layer architecture ensuring highest performance and security

cameraLayer.title: Surveillance Camera Layer
cameraLayer.description: Multiple cameras at different locations for comprehensive monitoring. Each camera transmits images directly via LAN to POE Switch.

networkLayer.title: Network Connection Layer
networkLayer.description: POE Switch receives all image streams from cameras, provides power and transmits data to server system.

processingLayer.title: Processing Server Layer
processingLayer.description: VMS Server manages video streams. AI Server performs real-time behavior analysis. Storage Server records 24/7.

operationsLayer.title: Operations Layer
operationsLayer.description: Live camera monitoring, abnormal behavior alerts, camera configuration management, video playback and report export.

advantages.title: Advantages
advantages.subtitle: Why Choose AIB?
advantages.description: Comprehensive solution delivering superior security system performance

reducedManpower.title: Reduced Manpower Load
reducedManpower.description: AI can monitor tens to hundreds of cameras simultaneously - something humans cannot do continuously.

earlyDetection.title: Early Risk Detection
earlyDetection.description: System detects abnormal signs early, reducing response time by 70-90%.

reducedFalseAlerts.title: Reduced False Alerts
reducedFalseAlerts.description: Context analysis distinguishes confusable behaviors like stroke falls vs fighting falls.

enhancedProactivity.title: Enhanced Proactivity
enhancedProactivity.description: Supports alerting before risks develop seriously, enabling early response.
